0.1.name: wordpress/drastic-table-manager
0.1.description:
DrasticTools is a collection of PHP and JS scripts that generate AJAX-based data managers and viewers for MySQL tables. DrasticGrid is a data grid that supports pagination, sorting, insertions, deletion and update of records.

The Drastic Table Manager plugin allows WP administrators to manage the MySQL tables that support WordPress.
